name: payment-method
description:
TMF670 Defines a specific method of payment (e.g. direct debit with all details associated) - Main payment method attributes are its type, details, name, description, isPreffered, status, status date Payment Method API performs the following operations on payment method. - Retrieval of a payment method or a collection of payment method depending on filter criteria - Partial update of a payment method - Creation of a payment method  - Notification of events on payment method: o Payment method state change o Payment method change o Payment method created o Payment method deleted
